1_overview.name: Overview
1_overview.rationale: All fields completed accurately based on Jira issue data; standard template section

2_background_context.name: Background/Context
2_background_context.rationale: Strong problem articulation from issue description; lacks direct customer quotes without VOC analysis

3_target_users.name: Target Users
3_target_users.rationale: Well-defined segments aligned with stated users (returning users, manufacturers implicitly represented); behavior patterns inferred from B2B context and constraints listed

4_objectives_goals.name: Objectives/Goals
4_objectives_goals.rationale: Goals directly map to stated problems and success criteria from issue; metrics framework comprehensive for B2B commerce

5_in_scope.name: In Scope
5_in_scope.rationale: Comprehensive feature set addressing all stated problems and goals; some technical implementation details may need engineering validation

7_success_metrics.name: Success Metrics/KPIs
7_success_metrics.rationale: Framework covers all goal areas; specific targets left as TBD per instructions; measurement approaches are standard

9_risks_considerations.name: Risks & Considerations
9_risks_considerations.rationale: Identified risks span technical, business, and user experience dimensions; mitigations are actionable; may not capture all edge cases

10_launch_plan.name: Launch Plan
10_launch_plan.rationale: Phased approach is industry standard; timelines are estimates pending engineering input; rollback plan included

11_post_launch_plan.name: Post-Launch Plan
11_post_launch_plan.rationale: Covers stabilization, optimization, and continuous improvement; standard post-launch practices

12_open_questions.name: Open Questions
12_open_questions.rationale: Questions are substantive and span key decision areas; will drive clarity in subsequent planning

strengths: Clear problem-to-solution mapping throughout the document
B2B-specific considerations woven into user segments, scope, and risks
Actionable scope definition with specific feature requirements
Comprehensive risk identification with practical mitigations
areas_for_improvement: Would benefit from VOC analysis to validate assumptions about user behavior
Technical feasibility of some algorithm features needs engineering review
Launch timeline estimates are approximations pending team capacity assessment
Some metrics targets require baseline data collection before finalization
dependencies: Scoping Agent: Out of scope definition
Design/UX Agent: Wireframes, mockups, UX notes
Engineering: Technical feasibility review and timeline validation

recommendations.action: Conduct user interviews to validate segment definitions
Establish baseline metrics from current OOS data
Get engineering capacity estimates for timeline validation
